version_description:
- Added new category with exclusive LIVE wallpapers
- Fixed minor issues

We hope you will enjoy our new live wallpapers. Thank you for your continuous support!

Thank you for your support!

Whats new in this version:
- added new wallpapers including Patterns, Shelves, Urban and many more styles!
- performance improvements
- fixed minor issues

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

Thank you for your support!

What's new in this version:
– New LIVE wallpapers categories
– iOS 11 compatibility
– Performance improvements

We are constantly adding new content and looking forward to your feedback on the App Store!

Hello!
Thank you for your valued feedback! Here's what we've done in this new version:
– Improved app performance
– Added new amazing content

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

Thank you for your support!

What's new in this version:
– iPhone X compatibility
– Performance improvements

We are constantly adding new content and looking forward to your feedback on the App Store!

Hello!

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

Hello! Thank you for your valued feedback!
Here's what we've done in this new version:
– Improved app performance
– Fixed some minor issues

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

We've added new content to Live Wallpapers:
– Enjoy new themes with keyboards!
– More live wallpapers, lock screens and home screens!

Also:
– Interface and usability improvements
– Fixed minor issues

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Hi there! Thank you guys for all your feedback and support!

Try our new crunchy and slime ASMR wallpapers. It feels sooo good to tap on them!

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

Have you ever experienced ASMR effect?
Try it now! Tap on wallpapers to enjoy relaxing sounds, calming visual effects, and pleasant haptic feedback.

A relaxing water sound, a plastic bag rustling and many more are already available in the app.

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

– Fixed minor issues

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

Hi there! Thank you guys for all your feedback and support!

Try our new crunchy and slime ASMR wallpapers. It feels sooo good to tap on them!

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

In this version, we have made some subtle but important improvements & fixes so you can get maximum fun from unique live wallpapers, themes, and keyboards.

We are committed to providing our users with a fantastic experience, and your feedback helps us make that possible.

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

– Full iOS 13 and iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro & iPhone 11 Pro Max support

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

The countdown to Halloween already started! This version will help you choose a perfect Halloween costume for your smartphone:
– Spooky pumpkins, witches and ghosts
– Non-scary minor bug fixes

We are committed to providing our users with a fantastic experience, and your feedback helps us make that possible. Please don’t forget to leave your review on the App Store!

– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Ho, ho, ho! Have you been good this year? Then we have some presents for you to unpack!
– Christmas content: snowy, crispy, with lights and crackers, Christmas trees and Advent wreaths, and, of course, with Santa and his helpers
– Bug fixes and performance improvements (cause we want some gifts from Santa as well)

Put your festive outfit on, decorate your Christmas tree and enjoy holidays with Live Wallpapers!

– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Want to hang out with friends, but saving gorgeous Live Wallpapers takes too much time?

Meet our extra helpful time-saving feature – FAVORITES!
Tap the heart every time you see a Live Wallpaper you like, then go to Favorites and save them all in one click!

Abracadabra, now you have all the time in the world!
No more excuses! Stop wasting time and start living your best life!

– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Have tons of free time now, huh? We’ve prepared something nice to jazz up your quarantining!
– Live Wallpaper Maker – create unique and funny wallpapers with personal videos and enjoy happy memories on a daily basis!
– Refreshed design for your streamline experience
– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Have tons of free time now, huh? We’ve prepared something nice to jazz up your quarantining!
– Fit and Fill modes - create live wallpapers that will perfectly fit your screen!
– Minor bug fixes and general improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Summer in the air, new update is here!
– Quick access icon for Live Wallpaper Maker. Now you can get there faster right from your Home screen!
– Performance improvements you won’t necessarily notice that will definitely enhance your experience with the app.
We love summer almost as much as getting your feedback on our app! Take a moment to leave a review on App Store.

– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you be willing to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Give your iPhone a makeover with the new update!
– Dope category with trendy wallpapers that will mesmerize even the pickiest
– Set a key photo while creating Live Wallpaper or add any key photo from your gallery
– Create unique wallpapers also with Live Photos or photo series
– Minor bug fixes and improvements

Would you like to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

Give your iPhone a makeover with the new update!

Here’s what this version has in store for you:
– Great performance improvements – now our app works at lightning speed

Would you like to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

The new version is close to perfection!
We’ve been working hard to find and fight annoying bugs, and we’ve made it. Hallelujah!

Would you like to leave us a review on App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

The new version is close to perfection!

Meet Customizer – a brand-new tool designed to add any text to the wallpaper you like. Motivational quotes, inside jokes, or even just your name – anything that boosts your mood!

Also, we’ve been working hard to find and fight annoying bugs, and we’ve made it. Hallelujah!

Would you like to leave us a review on the App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

In the new version, we’ve prepared something really awesome for you!

Mixed widgets added – time, date and the day of the week together right on your Home Screen. Huge amount of different styles – and spooky Halloween-themed widgets, of course – are included! Find the one that suits your screen best.

Also, we’ve been working hard to find and fight annoying bugs, and we’ve made it. Hallelujah!

Would you like to leave us a review on the App Store? It should only take a couple of minutes and would make an immense difference to us.

– Collections of custom icons to give a total makeover of your Home Screen.
– Time widgets – beautiful analog clock on your Home Screen. Night sky, autumn vibe, or storm aesthetics? You choose!
– We’ve been working hard to find and fight annoying bugs, and we’ve made it. Hallelujah!
